item.description:
Let's walk around Beacon Hill for a bit. I'll put up a map of the proposed walk later, but wanted to get this meetup out there now.

We'll meet at the Charles/MGH station - inside at the bottom, outside the fare gates so people driving can gather. I'll be taking the T. It's the All-Star Break, so there is no game at Fenway.

Here is the proposed map. Who knew that Beacon Hill is barely 4 miles of road. I thought it would be more. Parts of it can be pretty steep, so if we don't get 4 miles of walking in, I'm sure we'll all get a good workout with the hills. :)
item.how_to_find_us: See my pic, and I'll email my cell # to the RSVPs
item.name: Beacon Hill (4 miles)
